hPushover-0.1: Pushover.net API functions

Safe HaskellNone

Saas.Pushover

Contents

  • Data types
  • Default constructor
  • IO functions

Description

Small library that provides functions to send push messages to Android and Apple devices which have the Pushover app installed.

Synopsis

  • data PushMessage = PM {
    • token :: ByteString
    • user :: ByteString
    • message :: ByteString
    • device :: ByteString
    • title :: ByteString
    • url :: ByteString
    • urlTitle :: ByteString
    • priority :: Int
    • timestamp :: ByteString
    • sound :: ByteString
    • callback :: ByteString
    • expire :: Int
    • retry :: Int
    }
  • data PushResponse = PR {
    • status :: Int
    • request :: ByteString
    • receipt :: Maybe ByteString
    • errors :: Maybe [ByteString]
    }
  • data ReceiptResponse = RR {
    • receiptstatus :: Int
    • acknowledged :: Int
    • acknowledgedAt :: Int
    • lastDeliveredAt :: Int
    • expired :: Int
    • expiresAt :: Int
    • calledBack :: Int
    • calledBackAt :: Int
    }
  • type Apptoken = ByteString
  • type Receipt = ByteString
  • defaultMessage :: PushMessage
  • sendPushMessage :: PushMessage -> IO PushResponse
  • checkReceipt :: Apptoken -> Receipt -> IO ReceiptResponse

Data types

data PushMessage

The PushMessage data structure. To construct one of these, you should alter the message under *defaultMessage* using record syntax.

Instances

Eq PushMessage 
Show PushMessage 

data PushResponse

When you send a PushMessage, the server replies with at least a status code and a request number. See the pushover API documentation for what each field means.

Constructors

PR 

Fields

status :: Int
 
request :: ByteString
 
receipt :: Maybe ByteString
 
errors :: Maybe [ByteString]
 

Instances

Eq PushResponse 
Show PushResponse 
FromJSON PushResponse 

data ReceiptResponse

The reponse when you inquire about a receipt for a priority 2 message. See the pushover API documentation for what each field means.

type Apptoken = ByteString

type Receipt = ByteString

Default constructor

defaultMessage :: PushMessage

A default PushMessage (all empty fields except token, user and message will be removed later in the POST request, but the fields have to be there to overwrite them later (if you want)).

IO functions

sendPushMessage :: PushMessage -> IO PushResponse

Sends a push message to the Pushover servers.

checkReceipt :: Apptoken -> Receipt -> IO ReceiptResponse

Inquire about a receipt.
